column10: Supply Labour To Dismantle False Ceiling In Living Room & Bedroom
column17: A false ceiling is a ceiling installed directly beneath the main ceiling of the room. Its advantage is that it allows for multiple lighting points while concealing all the unsightly wires & casings.

column10: Supply Labour To Remove Bathtub
column17: A bathtub can either be installed as a built-in or standalone, depending on the look you are going for.

column10: Remove Concrete Support At Kitchen
column17: Concrete support is used for heavier items such as sink and gas hob.

column10: Remove Concrete Support At Toilet
column17: Concrete support is used for heavier items such as basin.

column17: Skirting is used to prevent water from seeping in the edges of the floor.
